评论详情: These are very comfortable. They fit very nicely and the material keeps your legs warm. These wash up nicely.
Perfect for summer time.

The fit was as expected but I personally don’t care for slinky fitting clothes. If you do like thin silky material you might love it. Taste is subjective. The workmanship is fine. It wasn’t a flattering fit for me.

评论概述: Flattering cargo pants for my Y2k moods
评论详情: These baggy cargo pants are giving me Aliyah vibes and I love them. They are casual but still look put together, and as I'm wide hipped, the fitted waist and baggy pant legs are actually very cute on me. I will be wearing them all fall.

评论概述: Great fit, launders well, very comfortable.
评论详情: These lightweight cargo pants are very comfortable and flexible to wear, especially in the hot weather we are now experiencing!  They fit well, and launder beautifully.  They look very nice on, and the color goes with every top I have.  I am delighted with them, and would recommend them without hesitation.
2XL fit me perfectly
I found the material to be the same as shown. I actually ordered up a size to a medium because I wanted it a little more baggy. :)

评论概述: good fit overall and looks great!
评论详情: These pants fit very nicely and is comfortable to wear around.  Stylish cargo pants!
Soft, lightweight material. True to size/color. Easy to wash.

评论概述: Versatile Cargo Pants with Soft Comfort
评论详情: These cargo pants are a perfect blend of style and comfort. The medium size fits me well, providing ample room to move without the annoying 'swish' sound. The fabric is incredibly soft and still maintains its color after multiple washes. I love pairing these pants with a blazer and sneakers for a chic office look or gearing up for outdoor adventures. They truly are a versatile wardrobe staple.
I love these really cute, comfortable cargo pants.  They fit very true to size and I haven't noticed any shrinkage feom the wash.  I really like the soft fabric.  They are well made

These are not the kind of cargo pants that are kind of heavy denim. These are very thin and light weight fabric and not comfortable pant. The material is also cheap.  They also run a size low. Overall disappointing.

I got the size that should have been one size up or at least in the low end of the upper size range, but it is way too small. I normally wear a size 20 and the XX-large is supposed to cover 20 to 22, but these are so tight I couldn't even fasten them. I would guess these would fit maybe a size 18 tops.  In addition, this fabric is so thin and light that it is virtually see through. I definitely do not recommend these unless flimsy fabric is okay with you.  If you do order them, try ordering up at least a full size and if you are at the top of the range in your own size and, if like your pants looser, I would even suggest going up 2 sizes. Not my favorite purchase by a long shot. Now I either have to lose 20 pounds to fit into these or give them away. Bummer!
For great true to size. Looks very stylish and comfy. Good quality with decent size pockets. Love the color to.

评论概述: Not what I think of when I think of cargo pants...
评论详情: When I think of cargo pants, I think heavy denim or canvas pants that can take a beating in the wild.  These are NOT those pants.  Instead, they are more flimsy nylon windbreaker-like material.  Might be great for bike riding in light gusts or walking the dog, but I wouldn't use them hiking or biking in the mountains.A little small size-wise, not exceptionally breathable or super comfortable,  I probably won't wear these very often.

I like these wide leg cargo pants They are very lightweight and super comfortable and fit true to size. I like these! They are a cargo style pants that has a silky feel to them. These fit me perfectly in the waist but they’re a bit long. They would be great for travel because of the fabric lightweight, and dry quickly. Overall, I am pleased with these cargo pants.

Super lightweight, and fit according to size.  Purchased a size S for my daughter who is 5'4".  Fit nice in the waist and perfect length.  I think they would be great for travel as well because of the fabric they are made out of.  lightweight, and dry quickly.  Over all she and I were both pleased with these cargo pants.

评论概述: Style + Comfort, Outdoors and in Office
评论详情: There are many cargo pant options for women these days in almost any brand that fits our fancy! We have pockets. And room to move. In all the colors. What sets these pants apart, at least for me, is how freaking SOFT they are without the typical 'swish swish swish' noise every time we walk into a room. If you're a girlie who wear's typical outdoor pants, you know the sound. My ladies, these are silent. ALSO, while we KNOW these pants are ready for outdoor adventures, feel free to pair these with a blazer, your favorite band tee, and heels (or street sneakers) but you better be ready to give co-workers the link to these because you'll be asked. The PRACTICAL THINGS: I'm a size 6ish (5/2, 130'bs, sporty build) and LOVE the fit of the Medium. After several washes, the color is still rich. And they may wrinkle a bit on rack but wonderfully iron out as you wear them.

I really like these! They are a light weight cargo style pant that has a silkyish feel to them. They dont hold heat in so they will be great on days you want to wear cargo pants without over heating.  The pockets are a good size for what you would expect to find on womans styling of pockets.  I have a mommy tummy so these do fit a bit odd on me. The length seems fine. I paired them with a niceer shit I have and they dress up really well. My teen loves them and has claimed them as hers now, so it looks like I will have to get a pair of my own in a size up.

I was pleasantly surprised by these. My daughter generally wears 0/2 and I was a little concerned the Small would be a bit big. These fit her perfectly in the waist and have some give in the back of the waist so they’d fit someone a bit larger as well. They’re a bit long, but she’s about 5’3 and they’re fine with shoes on. They’re a nylon-like material, so they sound and feel swishy when walking. They’re good for her for work in food service. She liked that the pockets at the waist are big enough for her phone (especially as there are no back pockets).

I bought these pants for my daughter to wear to work at a restaurant. I ordered her a small and they fit her great. She is 5'1" and 110 lb. They do not need to be hemmed which is the biggest win for me! They are extremely light weight. The fabric reminds me of a thin hiking pant material (almost like a "parachute" pant material). She loves them and will be wearing them all the time.

These are pretty much going in the bin. The material is awful. It feels like a parachute. It’s papery and uncomfortable and thin. There’s no quality to the material. The image makes it look like a thick cotton pant. It is not. I got a size large and they fit everywhere but don’t button so size up if you want these. I wouldn’t wear these out. They’re just not comfortable and look cheap
The pants are really thin. The material feels like satin. It does not stretch much. The pants are not flattering and too tight around my waist area. They are long in length for me.
Nice crisp look, the brown is true to the image. The sizing is accurate. There's a lot of stretch in the waistband. The material is a little heavier than windbreakers, it reminds me of hiking pants.
The material is a nice texture. Rich brown color.  Can be worn for work or play.

These are supposed to be a baggy,  wide-legged fit, but the waist is way too tight. These XXL pants are more like an XL. It's too bad, because they seem like nice pants. Light material. No rear pockets.
I purchased these pants for my daughter and she loves them. They are very lightweight and super comfortable and fit true to size. They will be great for fall and she loves the color.

评论概述: Nice pants but a little thin for "cargo" pants
评论详情: I ordered these Nylon/Rayon cargo pants because they looked super nice in the advertisement.  They come in three or four colors.  Also, they're high-waisted, which is what I wanted, and they're fairly comfortable to wear.  For me (I'm 5'8"), they're a little short for a Large size--and a little too tight in the waist.  However, I'm kind of in between sizes; I may order an XL next time.  Except for the fit (for me), these cargo pants are a good value.

I ordered a large because I like to have a little room in my clothes. I'm presently a size 8-10, which is typically a medium. These run super small. Despite having elastic on the back waistline, the pants cut into me. My teen daughter could wear these, but she didn't like the fit or style. If you are a thin, short, and skinny person, you might enjoy these.
